means: [医]环丙沙星：合成抗菌药，对革兰氏阳性和阴性包括一些对青霉素类、头孢菌素灰和氨基糖苷类抗药的菌株，亦可收效

sentence.Network_en: Objective To improve Piperazine condensation reaction in the preparation of Ciprofloxacin hydrochloride.

sentence.Network_en: Two of the most common drugs were the antibiotics triclocarban and ciprofloxacin.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中最普遍存在的药物就是三氯卡班和环丙沙星这两种抗生素.

sentence.Network_en: Ciprofloxacin was with the highest drug resistance, then were erythromycin and doxycycline.
sentence.Network_cn: 耐药性最高的是环丙沙星(29.24%), 其次红霉素(35.14%)、多西环素(42.83%).
